Whether the requesting application supports Team Drives. [default: false]

member.summary: A comma-separated list of sort keys. Valid keys are 'createdTime', 'folder', 'modifiedByMeTime', 'modifiedTime', 'name', 'name_natural', 'quotaBytesUsed', 'recency', 'sharedWithMeTime', 'starred', and 'viewedByMeTime'. Each key sorts ascending by default, but may be reversed with the 'desc' modifier. Example usage: ?orderBy=folder,modifiedTime desc,name. Please note that there is a current limitation for users with approximately one million files in which the requested sort order is ignored.

member.summary: A collection of arbitrary key-value pairs which are private to the requesting app. Entries with null values are cleared in update and copy requests.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Capabilities
member.summary: Capabilities the current user has on this file. Each capability corresponds to a fine-grained action that a user may take.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ContentHints
member.summary: Additional information about the content of the file. These fields are never populated in responses.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CreatedTimeRaw
member.summary: The time at which the file was created (RFC 3339 date-time).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CreatedTime
member.summary: representation of .

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Description
member.summary: A short description of the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ExplicitlyTrashed
member.summary: Whether the file has been explicitly trashed, as opposed to recursively trashed from a parent folder.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.FileExtension
member.summary: The final component of fullFileExtension. This is only available for files with binary content in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.FolderColorRgb
member.summary: The color for a folder as an RGB hex string. The supported colors are published in the folderColorPalette field of the About resource. If an unsupported color is specified, the closest color in the palette will be used instead.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.FullFileExtension
member.summary: The full file extension extracted from the name field. May contain multiple concatenated extensions, such as "tar.gz". This is only available for files with binary content in Drive. This is automatically updated when the name field changes, however it is not cleared if the new name does not contain a valid extension.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.HasAugmentedPermissions
member.summary: Whether any users are granted file access directly on this file. This field is only populated for Team Drive files.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.HasThumbnail
member.summary: Whether this file has a thumbnail. This does not indicate whether the requesting app has access to the thumbnail. To check access, look for the presence of the thumbnailLink field.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.HeadRevisionId
member.summary: The ID of the file's head revision. This is currently only available for files with binary content in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.IconLink
member.summary: A static, unauthenticated link to the file's icon.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Id
member.summary: The ID of the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ImageMediaMetadata
member.summary: Additional metadata about image media, if available.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.IsAppAuthorized
member.summary: Whether the file was created or opened by the requesting app.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Kind
member.summary: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "drive#file".

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.LastModifyingUser
member.summary: The last user to modify the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Md5Checksum
member.summary: The MD5 checksum for the content of the file. This is only applicable to files with binary content in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.MimeType
member.summary: The MIME type of the file. Drive will attempt to automatically detect an appropriate value from uploaded content if no value is provided. The value cannot be changed unless a new revision is uploaded. If a file is created with a Google Doc MIME type, the uploaded content will be imported if possible. The supported import formats are published in the About resource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ModifiedByMe
member.summary: Whether the file has been modified by this user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ModifiedByMeTimeRaw
member.summary: The last time the file was modified by the user (RFC 3339 date-time).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ModifiedByMeTime
member.summary: representation of .

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ModifiedTimeRaw
member.summary: The last time the file was modified by anyone (RFC 3339 date-time). Note that setting modifiedTime will also update modifiedByMeTime for the user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ModifiedTime
member.summary: representation of .

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Name
member.summary: The name of the file. This is not necessarily unique within a folder. Note that for immutable items such as the top level folders of Team Drives, My Drive root folder, and Application Data folder the name is constant.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.OriginalFilename
member.summary: The original filename of the uploaded content if available, or else the original value of the name field. This is only available for files with binary content in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.OwnedByMe
member.summary: Whether the user owns the file. Not populated for Team Drive files.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Owners
member.summary: The owners of the file. Currently, only certain legacy files may have more than one owner. Not populated for Team Drive files.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Parents
member.summary: The IDs of the parent folders which contain the file. If not specified as part of a create request, the file will be placed directly in the user's My Drive folder. If not specified as part of a copy request, the file will inherit any discoverable parents of the source file. Update requests must use the addParents and removeParents parameters to modify the parents list.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.PermissionIds
member.summary: List of permission IDs for users with access to this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Permissions
member.summary: The full list of permissions for the file. This is only available if the requesting user can share the file. Not populated for Team Drive files.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Properties
member.summary: A collection of arbitrary key-value pairs which are visible to all apps. Entries with null values are cleared in update and copy requests.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.QuotaBytesUsed
member.summary: The number of storage quota bytes used by the file. This includes the head revision as well as previous revisions with keepForever enabled.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Shared
member.summary: Whether the file has been shared. Not populated for Team Drive files.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.SharedWithMeTimeRaw
member.summary: The time at which the file was shared with the user, if applicable (RFC 3339 date-time).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.SharedWithMeTime
member.summary: representation of .

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.SharingUser
member.summary: The user who shared the file with the requesting user, if applicable.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Size
member.summary: The size of the file's content in bytes. This is only applicable to files with binary content in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Spaces
member.summary: The list of spaces which contain the file. The currently supported values are 'drive', 'appDataFolder' and 'photos'.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Starred
member.summary: Whether the user has starred the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.TeamDriveId
member.summary: ID of the Team Drive the file resides in.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ThumbnailLink
member.summary: A short-lived link to the file's thumbnail, if available. Typically lasts on the order of hours. Only populated when the requesting app can access the file's content.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ThumbnailVersion
member.summary: The thumbnail version for use in thumbnail cache invalidation.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Trashed
member.summary: Whether the file has been trashed, either explicitly or from a trashed parent folder. Only the owner may trash a file, and other users cannot see files in the owner's trash.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.TrashedTimeRaw
member.summary: The time that the item was trashed (RFC 3339 date-time). Only populated for Team Drive files.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.TrashedTime
member.summary: representation of .

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.TrashingUser
member.summary: If the file has been explicitly trashed, the user who trashed it. Only populated for Team Drive files.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Version
member.summary: A monotonically increasing version number for the file. This reflects every change made to the file on the server, even those not visible to the user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.VideoMediaMetadata
member.summary: Additional metadata about video media. This may not be available immediately upon upload.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ViewedByMe
member.summary: Whether the file has been viewed by this user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ViewedByMeTimeRaw
member.summary: The last time the file was viewed by the user (RFC 3339 date-time).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ViewedByMeTime
member.summary: representation of .

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ViewersCanCopyContent
member.summary: Whether users with only reader or commenter permission can copy the file's content. This affects copy, download, and print operations.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.WebContentLink
member.summary: A link for downloading the content of the file in a browser. This is only available for files with binary content in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.WebViewLink
member.summary: A link for opening the file in a relevant Google editor or viewer in a browser.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.WritersCanShare
member.summary: Whether users with only writer permission can modify the file's permissions. Not populated for Team Drive files.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CapabilitiesData
member.summary: Capabilities the current user has on this file. Each capability corresponds to a fine-grained action that a user may take.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CapabilitiesData.CanAddChildren
member.summary: Whether the current user can add children to this folder. This is always false when the item is not a folder.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CapabilitiesData.CanChangeViewersCanCopyContent
member.summary: Whether the current user can change whether viewers can copy the contents of this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CapabilitiesData.CanComment
member.summary: Whether the current user can comment on this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CapabilitiesData.CanCopy
member.summary: Whether the current user can copy this file. For a Team Drive item, whether the current user can copy non-folder descendants of this item, or this item itself if it is not a folder.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CapabilitiesData.CanDelete
member.summary: Whether the current user can delete this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CapabilitiesData.CanDownload
member.summary: Whether the current user can download this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CapabilitiesData.CanEdit
member.summary: Whether the current user can edit this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CapabilitiesData.CanListChildren
member.summary: Whether the current user can list the children of this folder. This is always false when the item is not a folder.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CapabilitiesData.CanMoveItemIntoTeamDrive
member.summary: Whether the current user can move this item into a Team Drive. If the item is in a Team Drive, this field is equivalent to canMoveTeamDriveItem.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CapabilitiesData.CanMoveTeamDriveItem
member.summary: Whether the current user can move this Team Drive item by changing its parent. Note that a request to change the parent for this item may still fail depending on the new parent that is being added. Only populated for Team Drive files.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CapabilitiesData.CanReadRevisions
member.summary: Whether the current user can read the revisions resource of this file. For a Team Drive item, whether revisions of non-folder descendants of this item, or this item itself if it is not a folder, can be read.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CapabilitiesData.CanReadTeamDrive
member.summary: Whether the current user can read the Team Drive to which this file belongs. Only populated for Team Drive files.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CapabilitiesData.CanRemoveChildren
member.summary: Whether the current user can remove children from this folder. This is always false when the item is not a folder.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CapabilitiesData.CanRename
member.summary: Whether the current user can rename this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CapabilitiesData.CanShare
member.summary: Whether the current user can modify the sharing settings for this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.CapabilitiesData.CanTrash
member.summary: Whether the current user can move this file to trash.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.FileList.IncompleteSearch
member.summary: Whether the search process was incomplete. If true, then some search results may be missing, since all documents were not searched. This may occur when searching multiple Team Drives with the "user,allTeamDrives" corpora, but all corpora could not be searched. When this happens, it is suggested that clients narrow their query by choosing a different corpus such as "user" or "teamDrive".

member.summary: The page token for the next page of files. This will be absent if the end of the files list has been reached. If the token is rejected for any reason, it should be discarded, and pagination should be restarted from the first page of results.

member.summary: An image file and cropping parameters from which a background image for this Team Drive is set. This is a write only field; it can only be set on drive.teamdrives.update requests that don't set themeId. When specified, all fields of the backgroundImageFile must be set.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.TeamDrive.BackgroundImageLink
member.summary: A short-lived link to this Team Drive's background image.

member.summary: Capabilities the current user has on this Team Drive.

member.summary: The color of this Team Drive as an RGB hex string. It can only be set on a drive.teamdrives.update request that does not set themeId.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.TeamDrive.CreatedTimeRaw
member.summary: The time at which the Team Drive was created (RFC 3339 date-time).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.TeamDrive.CreatedTime
member.summary: representation of .

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.TeamDrive.Id
member.summary: The ID of this Team Drive which is also the ID of the top level folder for this Team Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.TeamDrive.Kind
member.summary: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "drive#teamDrive".

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.TeamDrive.Name
member.summary: The name of this Team Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.TeamDrive.ThemeId
member.summary: The ID of the theme from which the background image and color will be set. The set of possible teamDriveThemes can be retrieved from a drive.about.get response. When not specified on a drive.teamdrives.create request, a random theme is chosen from which the background image and color are set. This is a write-only field; it can only be set on requests that don't set colorRgb or backgroundImageFile.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.TeamDrive.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.TeamDrive.BackgroundImageFileData
member.summary: An image file and cropping parameters from which a background image for this Team Drive is set. This is a write only field; it can only be set on drive.teamdrives.update requests that don't set themeId. When specified, all fields of the backgroundImageFile must be set.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.TeamDrive.BackgroundImageFileData.Id
member.summary: The ID of an image file in Drive to use for the background image.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.TeamDrive.BackgroundImageFileData.Width
member.summary: The width of the cropped image in the closed range of 0 to 1. This value represents the width of the cropped image divided by the width of the entire image. The height is computed by applying a width to height aspect ratio of 80 to 9. The resulting image must be at least 1280 pixels wide and 144 pixels high.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.TeamDrive.BackgroundImageFileData.XCoordinate
member.summary: The X coordinate of the upper left corner of the cropping area in the background image. This is a value in the closed range of 0 to 1. This value represents the horizontal distance from the left side of the entire image to the left side of the cropping area divided by the width of the entire image.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.TeamDrive.BackgroundImageFileData.YCoordinate
member.summary: The Y coordinate of the upper left corner of the cropping area in the background image. This is a value in the closed range of 0 to 1. This value represents the vertical distance from the top side of the entire image to the top side of the cropping area divided by the height of the entire image.
